title: City launches mixed-income housing on public land near transit hub
content: This article discusses a public-private partnership leveraging city-owned land to deliver mixed-income apartments adjacent to a transit hub. The plan blends LIHTC financing with green building standards and a culture-led placemaking strategy.

title: Retrofitting districts to net-zero through heat networks
content: A case study on district-scale retrofits and heat pump networks. The initiative examines governance models, private concessions, and equitable tariffs for low-income households.

title: Warehouse-to-arts hub conversion sparks local renaissance
content: Developers and a municipal arts council co-create a culture-led redevelopment, turning vacant warehouses into studios, public spaces, and affordable live-work units.
